snippet: Ms. Mantel, the author of the bestselling historical novels “Wolf Hall” and “Bring Up the Bodies,” will release a collection of short stories called “The Assassination of Margaret Thatcher.”
abstract: Ms. Mantel, the author of the bestselling historical novels “Wolf Hall” and “Bring Up the Bodies,” will release a collection of short stories called “The Assassination of Margaret Thatcher.”

headline.main: Hilary Mantel's Next Book Is a Story Collection
